description:
Right now Big Tech is trying to Bankrupt America.
•
•
•
They are pushing and selling fear across all of their outlets to their benefit. They pretend like they are there to help the small everyday person survive by offering X amount in FREE Facebook and Google advertising... However that couldn’t be further from the truth. •
•
•
They want this lockdown to continue as long as possible, the longer it goes the more traditional businesses go under and the more people will be forced to adapt to the new way of business which is based on their platform exclusively.
•
•
•
The issue there is that they continuously increase the costs to advertise and overtime you compete with Jeff Bezos and not Joe the Plumber... it’s a tough battle to win.
•
•
•
In addition Facebook to this they are using “Social Distancing” as a way to reduce their everyday office employees (45,000 of them) to work from home, meaning they will begin outsourcing their talent to being in a more diverse outlook AKA hire from overseas.
•
•
•
Jack Dorsey and Google will follow and we will see  tens of TRILLIONS in salaries leave America and flood to other countries in the coming years.
